comments.raw_text:
We used to use nsContentUtils::IsThirdPartyWindowOrChannel() to
determine the third-party channel when annotate the channel in
UrlClassifierCommon. Howeverm This is fission-incompatible. So, we
change it to use AntiTrackingUtils::IsThirdPartyChannel() which is
fission-compatible.
comments.creator: tihuang@mozilla.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 9148143
Bug 1637739 - Use AntiTrackingUtils::IsThirdPartyChannel() in UrlClassifierCommon::AnnotateChannel(). r?dimi!


We used to use nsContentUtils::IsThirdPartyWindowOrChannel() to
determine the third-party channel when annotate the channel in
UrlClassifierCommon. Howeverm This is fission-incompatible. So, we
change it to use AntiTrackingUtils::IsThirdPartyChannel() which is
fission-compatible.
comments.author: tihuang@mozilla.com
